verbs.description: [ARG1: first man] [V: is] [ARG2: laborious and stupendous first man might be the most grounded space movie ever made] the opening sequence hooks you on so many levels you can get motion - sick thinking back on it gil scott heron damien chazelle kyle chandler linus sandgren la la land james r hansen justin hurwitz supervisor deke slayton aldrin neil armstrong jason clarke mojave desert editor claire foy madeline janet u s imax ryan gosling technician toronto ed white new york magazine nasa josh singer first man tom cross corey stoll
